abstract.t: This specification describes a method in which resource owner password credentials can be augmented with a second authentication factor.

section.title: Access Token Request
section.t:
The client makes a request to the token endpoint by adding the following parameters using the "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" format per Appendix B with a character encoding of UTF-8 in the HTTP request entity-body:
REQUIRED. Value MUST be set to "http://auth0.com/oauth/grant-type/2fa-otp".
REQUIRED. The one-time password.
REQUIRED. The MFA token received from the first factor access token response.

section.title: Access Token Response
section.t: If the access token request is valid and authorized, the authorization server issues an access token and optional refresh token as described in in Section 5.1 of . If the request failed client authentication or is invalid, the authorization server returns an error response as described in Section 5.2 of .
